attributes.action: Return all utilities to state ownership.
attributes.additional_details:
The people of the United Kingdom are tired of being ripped off by giant corporations who run our utilities like a cash cow.

We the undersigned demand that all utilities are returned to state control and the state can use the profit to help fund other services in the UK

If utilities are returned to state ownership then the customer base will be massive and profits can be spent on our services rather than paying premiums to mega wealthy bankers and investors.
attributes.background:
During the Thatcher period and beyond the UK Government sold off everything to private corporations.
Utilities are a basic NEED in life and as such should NOT be owned by greedy profit grabbing entities .
